title: GET_WAVE_QUAD_AT_COORDS
content:
0x3F5A61A7// GetWaveQuadAtCoords
int GET_WAVE_QUAD_AT_COORDS(float x, float y);Parameters:x: The X coordinatey: The Y coordinateReturns: The wave quad index at the given position. Returns -1 if there isn't any there.This native returns the index of a wave quad if the given point is inside its bounds.Examples:Lualocal currentPedPosition = GetEntityCoords(PlayerPedId())
local waveQuadIndex = GetWaveQuadAtCoords(currentPedPosition.x, currentPedPosition.y)
codeBlocks:
// GetWaveQuadAtCoords
int GET_WAVE_QUAD_AT_COORDS(float x, float y);

local currentPedPosition = GetEntityCoords(PlayerPedId())
local waveQuadIndex = GetWaveQuadAtCoords(currentPedPosition.x, currentPedPosition.y)
